answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!I would suggest you get your blood sugar level checked, after 8-10 hours of fasting and two hours after food (post prandial). Diabetes should definitely be ruled out.Take care!

Our bodies sweat, and cry salty fluid regularly, but if yours tasted like sugar it could be your sugar intake is too much. Or if thats your only symptom and you have no pain or fatigue. I wouldn't really stress to much about it. ; )

question: I noticed today my tears are tasting sweet rather than salty. This hasn't been the case before. Is there something wrong with me? Has anyone ever heard of something like that or does anyone know what might be the cause of this? thanks for your help.
title: sweet tasting tears
